trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Carlsbad
There were no other sightings in Carlsbad on or around December 9th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were just getting home. My husband was unloading the truck. I turned andlooked to the east at the moon. I saw what appeared to be 4 stars lined up in arow above the moon.I thought that was interesting so I watched and told myhusband to look. I had been watching about 30 seconds or so, when my husbandjoined me. As I was pointed out the stars to my husband, suddenly two of thembegan to move. They accelerated so rapidly that within 2 or 3 seconds, they werecompletely gone. There was no noise or other phenomenon at all, they were justgone.Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
Summary: We saw two brightly lit objects take off
